results.title: Polystyrene Nanoplastics Can Alter the Toxicological Effects of Simvastatin on Danio rerio
results.text_hl: Concerning the @<m>DISEASE_Capillary_Malformation_Arteriovenous_Malformation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C564254 @@@malformations@@@ appearance, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ alone had similar effects than when in co-exposures (0.015 mg/L NPls plus 12.5 or 15 microg/L @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@).

citations.NLM: Barreto A, Santos J, Amorim MJB, Maria VL. Polystyrene Nanoplastics Can Alter the Toxicological Effects of Simvastatin on Danio rerio Toxics. 2021 Feb 26;9(3):. PMID: 33652851
citations.BibTeX: @article{33652851, title={Polystyrene Nanoplastics Can Alter the Toxicological Effects of Simvastatin on Danio rerio}, author={Barreto A and Santos J and Amorim MJB and Maria VL}, journal={Toxics}, volume={9}, number={3}}

results.title: Effects of Simvastatin on Fetal Cardiac Impairment in the Diaphragmatic Experimental Hernia Model.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: The potential to treat @DISEASE_Hernias_Diaphragmatic_Congenital @DISEASE_MESH:D065630 @@@CDH@@@ with antenatal @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ may improve the management of this @<m>DISEASE_Capillary_Malformation_Arteriovenous_Malformation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C564254 @@@malformation@@@.

citations.NLM: Pelizzo G, Bussani R, Mazzon E, Anfuso C, Lombardi C, Zambelli V, Zandonà L, De Silvestri A, Zennaro F, Calcaterra V. Effects of Simvastatin on Fetal Cardiac Impairment in the Diaphragmatic Experimental Hernia Model. Fetal Diagn Ther. 2019;46(1):28-37. PMID: 30199868
